useCase.description: Registering a Resource and Executing Steps

mainSequence.step: Language SDK registers a resource request with Resource Monitor
Resource Monitor registers a resource event with Step Generator
Step Generator checks the resource request with Resource Provider
Resource Provider responds to Step Generator with check results
Step Generator requests differences from Resource Provider
Resource Provider responds to Step Generator with differences
Step Generator initiates the step execution with Step Executor
Step Executor completes the step execution and informs Resource Monitor
Resource Monitor informs Language SDK about registration completion
